website_summaries.verdict: Bags are big enough to fit large items like a king-sized comforter with space to spare.
pros: Features include a clear window so you can easily identify what's in the bag
Handles on the bag allow for easier movement
Sealed by a zipper to keep your items away from the elements
Bags can be folded or forced to fit in tighter spaces since they have soft sides
cons: The seams may tear rather easily

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Convenient for sure but not too sturdy. Weight is a huge factor, even with clothing. Be careful when lifting by the handles. If you need storage bags that can be smashed down to squeeze in small spaces, then this is perfect. I gave 3 stars due to the sturdiness. Update: seller is great and even though I didn't ask for a different storage bag, they gave me one anyways. Highly recommend purchasing from this seller! New storage is bag is great and durable!
customer_reviews.author: KPDelgado

customer_reviews.title: Awesome under bed storage for low beds
customer_reviews.text: Our bed has a wood frame (not traditional wire bed frame) that makes under bed storage a challenge. Most under bed storage boxes are too tall and don’t fit underneath our bed. Been looking for a while and many are reviewed as too flimsy or having zippers that fall off after being used 2x. This one is good sturdy material and the zipper seems to be solid. There are handles for when you need to pull them back out to get something. I only gave these 4 stars because I don’t know how they will hold up after more time. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey24

customer_reviews.title: Versatile underbed storage bag
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to pack my summer clothes in & store under my bed. It holds quite a bit. Since it’s soft it can fit under any bed. But it is unstructured so it can get lumpy. Handles on the side are helpful with pulling the storage bag out. I also like that there are viewing windows. The zipper & material seem sturdy enough as long as you don’t overload it.
customer_reviews.author: Doctam

customer_reviews.title: Great for sheets, but not amazing quality..
customer_reviews.text: I got these to store some big blankets under my bed and its exactly what i needed. Quality doesn't seem amaaaazing, but it seems sturdy enough so far - at least for what I'm using it for. Good purchase for price. update: its been 2 months since I first got them - i'm still using them for sheets but the handles have started to pull off.. I really only recommend this for minimal amounts of things in them. If you want to put alot of sheets or blankets in them the handles will start to break.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old plastic ones.
customer_reviews.text: Easier to fill, since it's a flexible material. Strong fabric, strong zipper. I love the plastic's windows, so I can see the inside in case I forgot what's inside (I always forget). It was easy to slide it under my bed after placing 3 queen size comforters (pillow case and sheets included). The price it's fair and yes, I'd recommend it t any of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: AliehS

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bags!  You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Substantial material with quality construction. Measurements were very accurate and suggested size of intended content matched actual items I used them for almost perfectly. If you pay close attention to the size/dimensions of the items to be stored in relation to the size of the containers you order, you won’t go wrong. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Koger

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage bag
customer_reviews.text: This storage bag holds 2 queen sized comforters. It is now too fat to fit under the bed, but will be nice for keeping the comforters clean during storage. The one weird thing is the package showed a picture of 2 different sizes and gave 2 different dimensions, as you can see in the picture. I almost returned it before opening since that thicker bag is not what I am looking for. But when I opened it there were 2 of the thinner size like I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Mms321

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use under my son's bed. I just removed them from the plastic packaging they arrived in and the plastic/toxic stench is overwhelming. I choose these over sturdy plastic tubs because I wanted to avoid plastic. I'm now guessing that the fabric is made from plastic. The two plastic storage bins I own never had a terrible smell like this. I've put them out in the hallway to see if the odor situation will improve. But as it is, this is definitely not something I would use and certainly not in a child's room. I'll update if there is any improvement.
customer_reviews.author: NaturalInMaine

customer_reviews.title: Spacious storage and fits under my low bed
customer_reviews.text: I needed to utilize the storage potential underneath my bed, only problem is I have only 5 1/4” clearance. I have been searching for so long and this was a great decision. First because it’s a flexible cloth-so much more room for storage possibilities- and its more of a durable type material. I really am pleased with the fact that it’s long and I can use that otherwise empty space under our bed. I have no problem getting it just slides out. Keeper!!!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: I Regret This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: While it is large enough for blankets, the chemical odor is so bad it makes my whole room smell terrible, let alone the pillows or blankets I wanted to store in it. Also, it is so flimsly that when I pull it out, it is not an easy task to retrieve the items. I have used storage containers that have cloth sides to slide under my bed in the past, but they normally have something to stiffen the sides to keep it upright as you retrieve your items. I had not realized how important this feature is until I tried this product. It is definitly not worth the purchase. I will need to find another product to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than putting my seasonal clothes in a garbage bag and having to get them into the attic somehow. They fit under my bed perfectly. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McEntee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing kids rooms.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use under my daughters bed. She has a tiny closet and it was literally overflowing with blankets and sheets. I did not put comforters in them, but all of her sheets and smaller blankets. I had no problem sliding these under her bed, although one did slide better than the other. I would say what you have in them contributes to how well they slide. (her carpet is longer and plush). I will be ordering another set to keep baby dolls and barbies in.
customer_reviews.author: SamB

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to deal with than the hard plastic with rollers. Wish we'd bought these instead. They can be squished to slide under things and you can see what's in them.
customer_reviews.author: teacher06

customer_reviews.title: Not great for regular use
customer_reviews.text: These were too flexible for me, would crumple trying to slide back and forth under the bed (on carpet) and collapse when I tried to store them on a high closet shelf and take them down. Ended up selling these and buying hard plastic storage containers instead. If you're only going to pull them out a couple of times a year, they'd probably be okay. Not great for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: E G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these about a week but they are very nice storage bags. They look well made and upon opening, they seemed small but I fit a lot of linens in this. I like that they are narrow so I can store them under the bed maximizing space ore on a long shelf in the closet. Very impressed. I just ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Parsa

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my daughter's dorm room. A bit of an odor when they first came out of the packaging. We hung them up to air out overnight and the smell was gone in the morning. These are well constructed and seem durable. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: No Zippers😡
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 1 star because I received only one good bag....the other bag had no zippers.....how do you even make the bag with no zippers...now it is useless to me. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Both bags hold a decent amount of sheets/smaller blankets and fit nicely under the bed but the one did not zip correctly and the zipper keeps breaking apart. Overall a nice product, just must of gotten a defective one. Edit: they sent me a new bag and it works perfectly! I bumped it to 5 stars because of this. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lenker

customer_reviews.title: Roomy & slid under bed easily
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I fit a king size comforter & a blanket in to one & several winter blankets in to a second. They easily fit under my bed as they’re very pliable. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TripleD

customer_reviews.title: Second bag missing zippers - company solved problem quickly
customer_reviews.text: The second bag had no zippers so I paid $20 for one bag Edited to add the company contacted me and sent me a second set for free. I was also allowed to keep the one working bag I had. I'm happy with the resolution and changing my rating from one start to five stars. The bags are sturdy and roomy. Thanks MISSLO!
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Saves space and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Never knew these were a "thing". My mom always used/ still uses those annoying plastic underbed storage. Its such a hassle to get things in and out of the bed since you basically have to take it out completly. WELL i finally got something better than that. This keeps me sane. I had so many blankets for winter/ for guests staying that would fall over me when i kept them in my closet. Now i can easily pack them under my bed( which is really low), pull them out and i can see whats inside before doing so because of the see through sections. I like that its not completly see through because its not an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Okay - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: They had a strong plastic smell that took a bit to air out. They're small than I anticipated and it's a struggle to fit one of our bigger king size comforters in the storage bag. They work but slightly disappointed. Edited - upon seeing I was disappointed representatives reached out to me to make attempts to make sure I was satisfied. I appreciated this greatly and am increasing a start for that. The bag is good for what it is just not the size I thought it was.
customer_reviews.author: KBR

customer_reviews.title: That it very Sturdy and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I love that it Jumbo size and Sturdy and Strong. the Bed Organizer you can Storage clothes, Blanket, towels. This is the Best Organizer ever. It just the right size does take up any space at all. The seller did a Great job. I found a Bed Organizer that I really love. Thank you Curj
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J Poole

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these work well. I wish they were deeper. The width is good, but they're barely deep enough to fit a comforter in since there is no stretch. I was hoping to fit a comforter and a few blankets in each, but I can only fit one comforter and maybe a small blanket in each bag. The quality seems good for the price, though. Update - the seller contacted me and is recommending a different style of bag. I'm going to try the new one which I think will fit blankets better. I think this long bag would be better for clothing storage or small blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor that wouldn't go away.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up having to return these as they had such a strong odor that wouldn't go away after days of trying to air them out. It's a shame because the size was great, and they seemed extremely durable. If you can put up with the smell, then I've no doubt these would be great for you. But if you don't like strong smells, you'll want to stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Under bed organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love these to keep all my children’s extra blankets together under their beds so my littlest ones aren’t constantly dragging them out. Big enough to fit all their blankets in also. Great quality & great price!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Stink to high heaven and limp/sloppy.
customer_reviews.text: These STINK sooooo badly. Also, they're like a plastic bag that wants to collapse into itself and not keep any form, which if you want to slide these under a bed, is not conducive to a fun time. I wish I could return them but I don't want to pay shipping. Also, one had some weird black smudges inside. :(
customer_reviews.author: BlurryfaceTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good value for significant storage space
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a large amount of under bed storage but do have a strong helical small as many other reviewers have also pointed out. Seems to have improved with a few weeks but does make me wonder what the fabric was treated with
customer_reviews.author: M Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be sturdy and durable - time will tell if this remains true. As for the maneuverability, I find that trying to zip up he organizer around the corners it is a bit difficult but once I get around the corners it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised - nice quality and very practical
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by this simple purchase - the storage blocks are well made, the zippers work well, and I feel like this is exactly what I needed to store 2 duvets (of different weights for various seasons.) I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving space!
customer_reviews.text: Much more spacious than it looks like, and fits perfectly under my bed. Not sure how durable since I’ve only been using for a short while, but I don’t see how it won’t last. It’s bascially perfect to help save space, ecspecially if you home is on the smaller side. I’m also using these to prevent my dog from going under the bed, so that was unexpected plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing. I ordered this product to place all my kiddos blankets in and bedding. It fits well over 10 blankets ( with a comforter I believe it's a different story I didn't place one of those in there yet only kids blankets) plus the sheets and pillow cases. You can either store it standing in the closet or under the bed, it stands well when it's fully packed. It has handles so you can pull out from where ever you place it. I was very satisfied with this purchase, I was going crazy not knowing where to put all their crap at and this was really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: IlseOrtega

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how much these hold. I needed something that wasn't too tall and the height on these worked for me and I can slide them under the bed. I put a list of what is in the bag inside so I don't have to guess. Very pleased with the size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Update - Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I updated my review to 5/5 after the seller reached out to me and offered to replace the torn bag for free. I really appreciate the good customer service and would buy these again. Original: I was really hopeful that these bags would last based on previous reviews. However, I tried putting some clothes in this bag today and it ripped at the zipper on its first use.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Served our purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to be able to store things under a bed the size of it was great we got a lot of stuff in there but the handles are very weak they rip right off when you try to pick them up with the handles so we had to be very careful once we got them under the bed they serve our purpose
customer_reviews.author: DeLynn

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient storage option. It fits right under my daughters bed. I only wish it had something stiff in the bottom to stabilize it but I fill it up enough to not have to worry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these storage bags. They seem sturdy and held tons of seasonal clothes. They fit under the bed with no problem and are easy to maneuver to get out when needed. Price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wonders

customer_reviews.title: Straps ripped
customer_reviews.text: Use it to put away clothes that do not fit in my closet. Fits a good amount of clothes and slim enough for under the bed. Only downfall is that the straps to carry the bags are not too sturdy and quickly ripped a little. Had to stop using the straps and just carried it. A little cheaply made but paid a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: These fit under out low bed
customer_reviews.text: Most under the bed containers are still too high for our bed. These work because they are just a little shorter and are flexible and sturdy. They have plenty of romm for storage and solved our problem.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Useful for many things
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product i am using one for my out of season shoes and the other for my cook books they fit easily underneath my bed I am redecorating my kitchen so I have to store my cookbooks for a while this will keep them safe and dust free thanks for a great product Mimi
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and huge.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened these today, and these will work great for me. They seem very sturdy, and I’ll be able to get everything I have stuffed into two containers into one of these. The only thing is there is a slight odor from the inside lining, but it should be fine after airing out a few hours. Looking forward to using these!
customer_reviews.author: Dook

customer_reviews.title: Value and looks nice .
customer_reviews.text: We have a condo we rent out. We tried the vacuum bags, to put extra bedding in . they rip so then the don’t work . These bags seem to be very durable . And they look so much nicer:)
customer_reviews.author: Patty B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, shipping was very quick!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was exactly as described. Bags have areas that are clear so you can easily see what you placed in them. They hold a lot! Very happy with purchase and would purchase items again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A Krumm

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: The straps tend to rip if you use them to pull, so I grab the bag itself. They serve their purpose of utilizing space that is typically wasted under the bed, but I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing camping gear under my couch. I easily fit a king goose down comforter in one and tarps, tent pegs, pads and cooking gear in the other
customer_reviews.author: chesspickle

customer_reviews.title: Holds an impressive amount of kids clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. I needed it to squeeze under my girls bed so it had to not be a hard storage tote. It is just a fabric bag with a zipper and handles. No cardboard for sturdiness, but for us, we didn't need it for being shoved under the bed. was asked to change my rating from 4 stars to 5. I am happy with my purchase, however the fabric isn't stiff at all. it is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: christina satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and machine washable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for almost 2 years (2 sets) and I’m very happy with them. Sturdy, nice strong fabric, quality zipper, overall nicely made. Just put them through the washing machine and they came out good as new. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: My poor dogs just lost their hiding place
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and fit under my bed perfectly. My poor dogs just lost their hiding place.
customer_reviews.author: TheBadDog

customer_reviews.title: Good for car top cargo travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Misslo organizers to use to hold clothing inside a car top cargo bag during travel. Misslo is strong enough to carry as a suit case and toss onto roof of car. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Purchased 6 of these and very happy with the quality of the product. Was able to pack each one with about 200 beanie babies and able to carry without dear of the handles breaking. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: So far they seem awesome! I wanted a different alternative to the under the bed roller storage because I found they broke easily and I think this is a great replacement. They have way more storage space so I'm able to store more clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really happy with this set. They are just basically two big bags :(
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to even store horse’s winter blankets!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent storage/organizer. I use it to store my horse’s winter blankets. They are heavy and bulky, yet they fit nicely in the organizer. The handles on the organizers make it much easier to carry them.
customer_reviews.author: sandra d kanehl

customer_reviews.title: Working as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have only used one so far -- instead of soft goods, my wife filled it up with jewelry from her sales venture that had left her with too much stockpiled inventory and slid it under the bed. Not expecting any less valued usage from the second one.
customer_reviews.author: SierraBob

customer_reviews.title: storage bags.
customer_reviews.text: I am storing holiday quilts in the bags. Hopefully, they will be long-lasting and durable. They appear to hold what was stated.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't know yet about durability. Love them. Just exactly what I needed. Had trouble finding what would fit under my bed. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie James

customer_reviews.title: great for storage
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought 8 of these and have stored a lot of linens etc in them. they are great and store under your bed or closet
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: easy way to store stuff
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd have to buy those plastic container things, but the beige colored zipper bag type cases work great. one big thick comforter in one and two thinner comforters in the second one. under the bed till next winter. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy in the fact that they're cloth storage devices. They're holding up really well and hold a lot of spare bed linens, clothes, etc. Worth the price, for sure. I have two of these under our bed and they've held up from pulling in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fit under small opening
customer_reviews.text: I needed something I could smash under a 5.5 inch opening under a bed and this soft sided bag worked fine. The material does seem durable but only time will tell if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tigershops

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for seasonal clothing
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for storing clothes between seasons. My bed is an odd height off the ground and so this solves any issues of fitting. They are easy to maneuver and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J1

customer_reviews.title: Does what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Really does hold a king size comforter (once I figured out the best way to fold it). No structure until it’s filled. Easy to store under bed w/ the attached handles. It’s what we wanted at an acceptable price.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under the bed storage and organizing. Plastic windows could be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Can figure out how to get rid of plastic smell otherwise we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This storage bags look very expensive compared to others. I like the handle placement. Mine fit a king-sized fluffy blanket and fit under my couch. These are hand washable. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: hard to fit large blankets and king size comforter
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't fit our king size comforter. Bit smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden I

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I use this to store my purses and all sizes fit.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are made well and are perfect to fit under our bed. We only had a clearance of 7" and these bags fit perfectly. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: As described, just what I needed for off season clothing storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Arnsmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: These do just what they say. They are not canvas but they are a good under the bed storage I needed them for extra blankets and sheets. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: brenda jo nanni

customer_reviews.title: Large size
customer_reviews.text: Fits a lot inside. It’s lightweight so I wouldn’t overstuff, but with so much room thats not really a worry. Would definitely buy another set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These Are Roomy, Sharp-looking Storage Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These under the bed storage organizers were just what I wanted. They are quite roomy, feel sturdy and look very nice. They were delivered so quickly and arrived on Sunday by USPS! Like, wow, talk about great service! Seller gets high marks from me. I may need a reorder as well.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful storage for bedspread s etc secure under my bed
customer_reviews.author: jaye dunevant

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't pleased with the construction of this storage. Placed a blanket and the handles came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit under the bed!
customer_reviews.text: These were great for putting pillows and blankets to store under the bed. They fit perfectly and they also look very nice. I like that there is a window for easy viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Tonje Todal Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are very light weight and great for blankets and pillows and under bed storage.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Shiers

customer_reviews.title: Very practical!!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage packages! Will hold a lot of things and seem to be well made. I only wish there was a way to enforce the sodes to have a little bit of form once things are in it.
customer_reviews.author: AshAsh

customer_reviews.title: Size medium at most, not “jumbo”.
customer_reviews.text: Jumbo is incorrect. I bought the ziplock under bed storage bags and they were bigger. They’ll work I guess.
customer_reviews.author: juggalettekt

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are pretty thin and the zippers won't last.
customer_reviews.author: slundy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots more than I thought. Handles are a bonus.Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Terri Reeves Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hold a lot!
customer_reviews.text: These hold a lot! I put two regular plastic storage tubs worth of clothes in these. No chemical odor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W Dolian

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity.
customer_reviews.text: These storage boxes are large enough to hold my winter clothes. They’re also low enough to easily fit under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good buu
customer_reviews.text: Really spacious organizers, holds a lot of clothes, happy with it so far
customer_reviews.author: TMP1103

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to store clothing. I especially like that there are several clear plastic areas so you can see what is inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stolfa

customer_reviews.title: Quality storage bags
customer_reviews.text: This has help to reduce the clutter in the closet and a better option than plastic bins.
customer_reviews.author: shandy

customer_reviews.title: They zip up and stay sealed for the basements.
customer_reviews.text: Kids moved out and I used em to store the stuff they didn’t take. They worked out just fine
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This product broke before I even got to use it! I went to zip it and the zipper pulled right off- very cheaply made, super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Under the Bed Storage
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. I'm living in New York so storage is everything. These easily fit a few drawers worth of clothes and I just store them under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good organizers
customer_reviews.text: Good organizers for under my child's bed! Can fit lots of clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: SHoylman

customer_reviews.title: They serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best quality or fabric for the price. Next time I'd want to spend a little more and get a more high quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Safe travels
customer_reviews.text: I used it for traveling to winter home . Was able to get so much in it to lay flat . Much easier traveling making it able to see out all windows. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: I am very well satisfied with these bags, they’re very sturdy and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Not very solid
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with these. Have definitely seen better. Gave mine away to someone else. Flip-floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add space!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these organizers a couple years ago. They have been durable, easily maneuverable, and so convenient! I just purchased another set. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Chibucos

customer_reviews.title: Terrific under-bed storage
customer_reviews.text: These are perfectly sized to store bedding under my beds. I like the handles for pulling them out, and the clear “windows” to see what is in each one. I originally got 2 - I like them so much I got 4 more!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Holm

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly under the bed. Good quality. I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find that my large comforter would fit in one of the organizers.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Storage Solution!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item for underbed storage. All my blanket, pillow and seasonal storage issues are solved!! Zipperfunktion is ideal, fabric material makes this organizer perfect. Do not overstuff with items!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... a little bit overpriced as the quality is quite bad. I dont think that it is going to ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little bit overpriced as the quality is quite bad. I dont think that it is going to last long
customer_reviews.author: rootchka

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Bags
customer_reviews.text: The storage bags are great. I have used all but two and they will be in use before long. So happy I saw these because they were just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Koepp

product_meta.title: Misslo Jumbo Under The Bed Organizer for Comforters, Sturdy Oxford Fabric Blanket Storage, Set of 2
feature_bullets: Breathable & washable environmental fabric like canvas, this underbed storage container will last for many years;
3 sides clear windows for easy viewing, you can pick out your bedding in any angle at a glance(convenience than a side vinyl panel blanket storage container );
Reinforced 4 handles on 3 ends make the narrow storage container slide easily from closet or dresser or under the bed;

Two-way Zippered clothes bag, metal zippers keep dust out and the wrapping paper storage container can be folded flat when not in use, each Folding storage bag big enough to fit one king size comforter and still have space for holds out of season clothes, towels;
37 2/5" by 17 7/10" by 6", 2 packs Jumbo underbed storage bag for clothing, sweaters, toys, comforters, pillow case, gift wrap, extra sheet sets and linens; Backed by Misslo 1-year limited service;

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars443 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
